name: (06/12) The Cleaner
description: Inspired by both Hitman and Viscera Cleanup Detail, The Cleaner puts you in the slippers of a cleaning lady who can't take any more disrespect. Help her splatter her way through a hitlist of evil middle managers and carefully erase all evidence of her deeds, leaving no one the wiser. Game six in my 12 games in 12 months Dev Diary challenge, intentionally designed for speedrunning, on a whim.
